title: News24.com | 'We must avoid rush to reopen': Ramaphosa announces 5 levels of phasing out
description: On the same day the country recorded its biggest spike in the number of positive Covid-19 cases, President Cyril Ramaphosa announced a five-level phased approach towards the easing of lockdown restrictions will be introduced.
content:
On the same day the country recorded its biggest spike in the number of positive Covid-19 cases, President Cyril Ramaphosa announced a five-level phased approach towards the easing of lockdown restrictions will be introduced.
